name: Anymailfinder
purpose: Find and verify email addresses using nominative enrichment patterns
description: Email enrichment service that finds decision-maker emails by combining first/last names with company domains in multiple nominative patterns. Uses pattern matching (first.last@domain, flast@domain, etc.) to discover valid email addresses. Only charges for successfully found emails, not attempts.
cost_structure: $0.0025 per valid email found (pay only for results)

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Bulk Email Enrichment for Outbound Lead Generation
use_cases: enrich lead lists with decision-maker emails
find contact information for target companies

steps: Import CSV with company domains or names
System tests multiple email patterns per contact
Download enriched list with valid emails only

integration_with_other_tools: Apify Google SERP Scraper (domain discovery → email enrichment)
Apify Google Maps Scraper (local business → email enrichment)
Apify LinkedIn Jobs Scraper (intent-based leads → email enrichment)
Apify Social Media Scrapers (profile data → email enrichment)

strengths: Only charges for valid emails found (not attempts)
Enterprise arbitrage: 1:40 credit ratio for company searches
Nominative enrichment handles name variations automatically
Fast bulk processing (40 records in 10-15 minutes)
Works with incomplete data (just company + name)
Integrates well with all scraping tools
limitations: Requires company domain or name as input
Success rate varies by data source quality
Lower success rate for smaller companies (< 50 employees)
May not find emails for very privacy-conscious companies
